features.headline: Everything You Need for
features.description: Complete platform to monitor, understand, and act upon air quality conditions around you.
features.realtimeIoTDesc: HAWA IoT sensors deployed in strategic Bandung locations, sending PM2.5, PM10, temp, and humidity data instantly.
features.metaAIDesc: AI from Meta Llama 4 analyzes sensor data and provides health recommendations that are easy to understand.

howItWorks.headline: From Sensor to Recommendation
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps for healthier air
howItWorks.step1Desc: HAWA IoT sensors installed in Bandung measure PM2.5, PM10, temperature, and humidity every second automatically.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Data is sent to Meta Llama 4 which processes and provides air condition analysis along with risk levels.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Results are displayed on an interactive Bandung map complete with district climate predictions and trend charts.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Get activity advice, WhatsApp notifications, and safety tips based on current data in your area.

aboutUs.headline: Protecting Bandung Citizens with Data & AI
aboutUs.desc1: HAWA is an IoT and AI-based air quality monitoring platform designed specifically to help Bandung citizens understand and respond to air conditions in their environment.
aboutUs.desc2: With sensors scattered in strategic points and AI analysis from Meta, we provide accurate and easy-to-understand real-time information.
